content.rendered:
Congratulations to all of the students at Colegio Gran Bretaña who worked hard and achieved great results in the June 2022 IGCSE exams. In particular, a huge round of applause to Jossue and Felipe for their outstanding achievements.

Jossue, we are thrilled to hear that you attained Top In Colombia for Biology and Physics, along with High Achievements in Chemistry, Geography, and World Literature. Knowing that the IGCSE High Achievement award is only given to the students that are in the top three of a country for any single subject, it is little surprise then that you were also recognised with the Best Across Eight in Colombia award. This award is given for the highest cumulative results across all of the subjects studied.

Your hard work and dedication to your studies have truly paid off, and you should be incredibly proud of yourself. These subjects are not easy, and to excel in all of them is a remarkable accomplishment.

All of the sciences are subjects that require a lot of critical thinking and problem-solving skills, and it’s clear that you possess these qualities in abundance. Your ability to analyze complex scientific concepts and apply them to real-world situations is truly impressive. It’s no surprise that you’ve been recognized as the best in Colombia for IGCSE Biology and Physics and as a high achiever in Chemistry.

In addition, your high achievements outside of the sciences, in Geography and World Literature show that you are a well-rounded student with a broad range of interests and talents. It’s not easy to excel in multiple subjects, but you’ve managed to do so with flying colours. Your love for learning and your dedication to your studies are inspiring, and we have no doubt that you will continue to achieve great things in the future.

Felipe, we would also like to congratulate you on your remarkable achievement of Top In Colombia for Mathematics Without Coursework and your High Achievement in Foreign Language Spanish. Mathematics is a subject that requires a lot of logical thinking and problem-solving skills, and it’s clear that you have a talent for it. Your ability to solve complex equations and apply mathematical concepts to real-world problems is truly impressive.

In addition, your high achievement in Foreign Language Spanish shows that you have a strong grasp of the language. Being fluent in a foreign language is an invaluable skill that will serve you well in your future endeavours. Your dedication to learning and your passion for the Spanish language is inspiring.

The achievements of Jossue and Felipe, as well as all of the students who worked hard and achieved great results in the IGCSE exams, continue the history of excellent IGCSE results being attained by the students of Colegio Gran Bretaña.

 

Congratulations once again to all the students who worked hard and achieved great results in the 2022 IGCSE exams. Your achievements are a testament to your hard work, dedication, and passion for learning, and we have no doubt that you will continue to achieve great things in the future. Keep up the great work, and best of luck in all your future endeavours!
